rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south and east side for natural light; designed following Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
Open dining space with minimal partitioning; incorporates a north-east corner design as per Vastu guidelines.
Modern kitchen with large windows and ventilation; aligns with Vastu norms ensuring good airflow.
Spacious master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows; oriented in the north-west direction to harness positive energies.
Secondary bedroom designed with minimalistic elements; features floor-to-ceiling windows for brightness.
Additional bedroom that adheres to Vastu principles with balanced natural light.
Compact bedroom space; includes floor-to-ceiling windows for enhanced light penetration.
Small bedroom designed to complement the overall aesthetic; follows Vastu principles for optimum energy flow.

openings.description: Main entrance designed to welcome positive energy; aligned with Vastu recommendations for front entry.
Secondary exit with proper alignment to facilitate energy flow as per Vastu principles.
Double car garage door designed for ease of access; incorporates structural robustness typical of Brutalist architecture.

additional_features.description: Expansive garden area on the west-facing plot; designed to balance the harshness of Brutalist architecture with natural elements.

structural_elements.notes: The design emphasizes raw, unfinished materials and heavy, robust structural forms in keeping with Brutalist aesthetics while adapting to the irregular plot shape. The west-facing garden integrates seamlessly with Vastu-aligned spaces.
